title: Emmerdale fans think they've rumbled Nate's real link to Cain after Faith bombshell
text:
Get the biggest soaps stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Emmerdale viewers think they might have rumbled who Nate Robinson is, ahead of his true identity being exposed.

The character clearly has a vendetta against Cain Dingle, meddling in his life by starting an affair with his wife Moira, while also trying to get his son Kyle taken out of his care.

Viewers have had two strong theories ever since he arrived in the Dales, with many predicting he his Cain's secret son.

Others thought he might be related to someone Cain has hurt or upset over the years, believing that Nate is now wanting revenge on the village baddie for whatever reason.

(Image: ITV)

But now, following a bombshell about Faith, Cain's mother, fans are speculating there's something else going on.

Faith actress Sally Dexter spoke exclusively to Mirror Online at the Inside Soap Awards 2019, hinting the big reveal would be "shocking" and "emotional.

Not only that, she revealed Faith would have to leave in the fallout, with the big scenes set to impact her, Cain and Moira.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

Now, this has driven several fans to adopt a new theory about the truth over Nate's identity and what has brought him to the village.

They now think Nate is not Cain's son, but his brother and that he could in fact be Faith's secret child.

One fan tweeted: "If Cain and Nate turn out to be brothers my jaw will hit the floor. I’m likely way off, but I would go out with that. I’d be on board and it would explain a lot."

(Image: ITV)

Another asked: "Is Nate Faith's son?"

A third added: "I'm feeling like I'd prefer him to be Faith's son, but his vendetta seems to be against Cain specifically. Is it going to be a repeat of Debbie, where Cain knocked someone up but didn't know, and Faith kept it from him?"

Meanwhile some still believed Cain was his father, with a viewer tweeting: "So Nate is Cain’s son?! How are they gonna spin that? Ha."

Emmerdale airs weeknights at 7pm on ITV, with an extra episode at 8pm on Thursdays.
description: Emmerdale's Nate will find his true identity exposed in upcoming scenes, with him thought to be linked to Faith and Cain Dingle
